project.description:
It try to process "repo init" at root folder. The -j option can set the number of threads, so it should be handled by referring to the number of CPU cores.
* You need to update 'tizen_id' with your own id in repo init command.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "repo init"
cd /root/
repo init -u ssh://tizen_id@review.tizen.org:29418/scm/manifest -b tizen -m unified_standard.xml
